overview: Want to get closer to the action than ever before? Jay's POV is the perfect place to be! Director and POV master Jay Rock gives you a front-row seat for scenes with a quartet of classic beauties: Valentina Nappi, Alexis Adams, Samantha Rone and Alix Lynx. Three blondes, one brunette and a perfect perspective on all the hardcore fun, captured in crystal-clear 4K Ultra HD to give you the rawest, most vivid POV experience imaginable!
title: Jay's POV Volume 1
